attributes.action: Remove Rishi Sunak as prime minister have early elections as he is incompetent
attributes.additional_details: This government distroyed this country firts brexit which was biggest mistake in their life , they promised to stop the illegal migration to which the numbers are higher than before brexit , they send all tax money on hotels and accommodation for illegal migrants and visas, they focus on banning some dog breed instead giving heafty prison sentences for irresponsible owners , not helping to people with energy bills cost of living prices , and we didn’t vote for them its time to get what we want
attributes.background: To Remove current prime minister as he is not fir for work and have early elections to fix this country because of brexit i can go to my home country with my husband , struggling to live with high bills and they care about migrants and some nobody wants this government

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.

You may wish to sign the following petition:

Call an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
